channel.title: Toronto Nepali Film Festival
channel.description: Recent content on Toronto Nepali Film Festival

item.title: TNFF 2018 Schedule
item.description: Session A (1:30 PM - 3:30 PM) 1:45 Pink Tiffany (44 mins) by Sophie Dia Pegrum 2:30 The Curious Case of Mr. Bhim Thapa (14 mins) by Bhakta Chand 2:45 The Eldest Son (30 mins) by Amy Benson 3:15 Maila Dai - A Man Who Rebuilt a Village (6 mins) by Rajeela Shrestha Session B (4:00 PM - 5:45 PM) 4:30 Lachhamaniya (16 mins) by Bikas Neupane 4:46 Ananta Yatra (15 mins) by Sunil Pandey

item.title: Submissions for TNFF 2018 are open
item.description: For information in Nepal please contact: Sangam Pulami Magar pulamisangam@gmail.com For information in Canada or outside of Nepal please contact: Marygold Bhandari executivedirector@tnff.ca Entries are now being accepted for the 9th Annual Toronto Nepali Film Festival to be held on May 19th, 2018. Films will be selected based on merit and the content of the films. The jury will consider relevant Nepali narratives, methods of storytelling, new genres in the context of Nepali filmmaking, technical finesse, and other attributes of filmmaking in the selection process.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to send just a message for any questions you have. We’d love to hear your feedback! Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
